name: full-heal
effect: Used on a party Pokémon : Cures any status ailment and confusion.
short_effect: Cures any status ailment and confusion.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: Heals all the status problems of one POKéMON.
flavor_text.emerald: Heals all the status problems of one POKéMON.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: A spray-type medicine. It heals all the status problems of one POKéMON.
